      • create

        public boolean create(IDataSpaceClient.IRemoteSource source)
               throws NotConnectedException,
                      PermissionException
        Description copied from interface: IDataSpaceClient
        Creates a new file or folder in the specified dataspace dataspace.
        Specified by:
        create in interface IDataSpaceClient
        Parameters:
        source - the remote source used to identify the type of file to create and its location.
        Returns:
        true if the creation has succeeded, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        NotConnectedException - if the client is not logged in or the session has expired
        PermissionException - if the user does not have permission to upload the file to the specified location in the server
